component.name: HomeScene
component.script:
sub init() m.top.setFocus(true) m.getVideoUrlTask = CreateObject("roSGNode", "GetVideoUrlTask") m.getVideoUrlTask.ObserveField("url", "playStream") m.getVideoUrlTask.control = "RUN" end sub
function playStream() videoContent = createObject("RoSGNode", "ContentNode") videoContent.url = m.getVideoUrlTask.url videoContent.title = "RDI" videoContent.streamformat = "hls" m.video = m.top.findNode("Video") m.video.content = videoContent m.video.control = "play" end function
